name: 2021 7th International Conference on Architecture, Materials and Construction
content: Publication and indexï¼š The accepted papers with registration and presentation will be published in Lecture Notes in Civil Engineering (ISSN: 2366-2557) as a proceedings book volume. Springer will conduct quality checks on the accepted papers and only papers that pass these checks will be published. Indexed by Scopus and EI Compendex. All books published in the series are submitted for consideration in Web of Science.
